title: The Game Changer
description: Alice has been working as Oliver Park's special assistant for a while and she is not sure how much more she can take. She has finally tried to accept the rules but when Oliver asks for her help and she finds out he has tricked her, Alice doesn't know if she can ever forgive him.'The Game Changer' is the explosive finale to 'The Millionaire's Assistant' Series. This book is hot and fully of spicy sex and romance. This is a romantic erotica for those that like their romance's to be naughty.
author: Helen    Cooper
